EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow for the Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for the Best Practices in Ecommerce workshop hosted by BigCommerce. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We’re looking forward to seeing you in Chicago tomorrow for the Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop! When: Tuesday, June 7th, 11:00AM - 4:30PM, includes complimentary buffet lunch Where: Hyatt Regency Chicago, Gold Level, West Tower, Regency Ballrooms, 151 E Upper Wacker Dr, Chicago, IL 60601
Agenda:
- 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM | Registration, Lunch sponsored by PayPal
- 12:00 PM - 12:15 PM | Welcome, Brent Bellm, BigCommerce CEO
- 12:15 PM - 12:45 PM | Rewiring Commerce: Connecting with Today’s Consumers, Brad Brodigan, PayPal, VP and GM of Retail & Mid Market, North America
- 12:45 PM - 1:45 PM | Best Practices in Store Design, Adam Alter, author of NYT bestseller 'Drunk Tank Pink'
- 1:45 PM - 2:45 PM | Best Practices in Store Conversion, Doug Stephens, author of The Retail Revival. Syndicated columnist for CBC Radio. Co-host of The Future In Store.
- 2:45 PM - 3:30 PM | Best Practices in Omnichannel, Doug Stephens, author of The Retail Revival. Syndicated columnist for CBC Radio. Co-host of The Future In Store.
- 3:30 PM | Reception, “A Taste of Pappy” featuring a Pappy Van Winkle bourbon tasting Sponsored by: PayPal, Americaneagle.com, Ecommerce Partners, Groove, Plum Tree Group, Silk Software
“Of course, this is no ordinary bourbon. Pappy Van Winkle has become the most famous whiskey in America, a unicorn unseen on store shelves for years, untasted by the vast majority of humans, and sold for astronomical sums on the secondary market. Those 28 bottles have a retail value of around $3,000 and a secondary value of perhaps $20,000, depending on age.” — Esquire Best, The BigCommerce Team
